full_summary:
=====================================

**Event B - Dry Sludge Removal**
=====================================

**Reference Number:** WS4287479914-Doc4350292524
**Solicitation Number:** WS4287479914
**Publication Date:** December 12, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 4, 2024, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Standard Time)
**Amendment Date:** December 19, 2023

**Background:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit a standing offer for dry sludge removal services. This project aims to provide a reliable and efficient dry sludge removal solution for the Department of National Defence (DND) facilities.

**Contract Details:**

*   **Contract Term:** Estimated contract start date: December 15, 2023; Estimated contract end date: December 14, 2024
*   **Contract Type:** Standing Offer
*   **Bidding Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other relevant trade agreements
*   **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick

**Key Contact Information:**
[Mintzer, Kate] (elle-la / she-her)
Kategic Purchasing Lead
(Public Services and Procurement Canada / Ministère des Services publics et de la Procurité de Canada)
MPB Building, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
Kate.Mintzer@TPS-GC-PWGSC.gc.ca

I would have made the formatting easier to read, formatted the tables, and used clear headings. Conversely, I took steps to add bullet points and[I reformatted them as requested].
